member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the file. Drive will attempt to automatically detect an appropriate value from uploaded content if no value is provided. The value cannot be changed unless a new revision is uploaded. If a file is created with a Google Doc MIME type, the uploaded content will be imported if possible. The supported import formats are published in the About resource.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedByMe
member.summary: Whether the file has been modified by this user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedByMeTimeRaw
member.summary: The last time the file was modified by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedByMeTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedTimeRaw
member.summary: The last time the file was modified by anyone (RFC 3339 date-time). Note that setting modifiedTime will also update modifiedByMeTime for the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ModifiedTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Name
member.summary: The name of the file. This is not necessarily unique within a folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.OriginalFilename
member.summary: The original filename of the uploaded content if available, or else the original value of the name field. This is only available for files with binary content in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.OwnedByMe
member.summary: Whether the user owns the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Owners
member.summary: The owners of the file. Currently, only certain legacy files may have more than one owner.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Parents
member.summary: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file. If not specified as part of a create request, the file will be placed directly in the My Drive folder. Update requests must use the addParents and removeParents parameters to modify the values.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Permissions
member.summary: The full list of permissions for the file. This is only available if the requesting user can share the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Properties
member.summary: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps. Entries with null values are cleared in update and copy requests.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.QuotaBytesUsed
member.summary: The number of storage quota bytes used by the file. This includes the head revision as well as previous revisions with keepForever enabled.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Shared
member.summary: Whether the file has been shared.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.SharedWithMeTimeRaw
member.summary: The time at which the file was shared with the user, if applicable (RFC 3339 date-time).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.SharedWithMeTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.SharingUser
member.summary: The user who shared the file with the requesting user, if applicable.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Size
member.summary: The size of the file's content in bytes. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Spaces
member.summary: The list of spaces which contain the file. The currently supported values are 'drive', 'appDataFolder' and 'photos'.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Starred
member.summary: Whether the user has starred the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ThumbnailLink
member.summary: A short-lived link to the file's thumbnail, if available. Typically lasts on the order of hours. Only populated when the requesting app can access the file's content.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ThumbnailVersion
member.summary: The thumbnail version for use in thumbnail cache invalidation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Trashed
member.summary: Whether the file has been trashed, either explicitly or from a trashed parent folder. Only the owner may trash a file, and other users cannot see files in the owner's trash.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.Version
member.summary: A monotonically increasing version number for the file. This reflects every change made to the file on the server, even those not visible to the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.VideoMediaMetadata
member.summary: Additional metadata about video media. This may not be available immediately upon upload.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ViewedByMe
member.summary: Whether the file has been viewed by this user.

member.summary: The last time the file was viewed by the user (RFC 3339 date-time).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ViewedByMeTime
member.summary: representation of .

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.ViewersCanCopyContent

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v3.Data.File.WebContentLink

member.summary: Whether to keep this revision forever, even if it is no longer the head revision. If not set, the revision will be automatically purged 30 days after newer content is uploaded.
